title: The Clifford rotary cultivator
creator_credit: G Burger, Clifford Aero and Auto Ltd and Orion Pictures Corporation
brief_description: Describes and illustrates the rotary cultivator, the machine that does the ploughing, harrowing and cultivating in one operation. Commentary by Frank Phillips.
